当たりさわりのない: (あたりさわりのない) - harmless and inoffensive
当たりめ: (アタリメ) - dried squid; dried cuttlefish
当たりをつける: (あたりをつける) - to guess; to estimate
当たりを付ける: (あたりをつける) - to guess; to estimate
当たりを取る: (あたりをとる) - to make a hit; to have a great success (e.g. in business, with a play, etc.)
当たり判定: (あたりはんてい) - collision detection; CD
当たり外れ: (あたりはずれ) - hit or miss; risk
当たり屋: (あたりや) - lucky person/someone who made a lot of money (e.g. gambling or on the stock market); {baseb} skilled batter/batter on a hot streak; accident faker/someone who jumps in front of cars on purpose to extort money; barbershop
当たり年: (あたりどし) - good or lucky year
当たり散らす: (あたりちらす) - to find fault with everybody; to make oneself disagreeable
当たり日: (あたりび) - day that something happens; day that one happens across something
当たり狂言: (あたりきょうげん) - a hit play
当たり籤: (あたりくじ) - winning ticket; lucky number
当たり負け: (あたりまけ) - {sports} loss of momentum or follow-through as a result of impact; getting knocked aside
当たり障らず: (あたりさわらず) - avoiding committing oneself; noncommittal
当たり障り: (あたりさわり) - (often as 当たり障りがない, 当たり障りのない, etc.) obstacle
当たり障りのない: (あたりさわりのない) - harmless and inoffensive
当たり障りの無い: (あたりさわりのない) - harmless and inoffensive
当たる: (あたる) - (ant: 外す・4) to be hit/to strike; to touch/to be in contact/to be affixed; to be equivalent to/to be applicable/to apply to; to be right on the money (of a prediction, criticism, etc.); to be selected (in a lottery, etc.)/to win; to be successful/to go well/to be a hit; to face/to confront; to lie (in the direction of); to undertake/to be assigned; to be stricken (by food poisoning, heat, etc.)/to be afflicted; to be called upon (by the teacher); to treat (esp. harshly)/to lash out at; (as 〜するには当たらない, etc.) to be unnecessary; {baseb} (usu. as 当たっている) to be hitting well/to be on a hitting streak; (in fishing) to feel a bite; (of fruit, etc.) to be bruised/to spoil; to feel (something) out/to probe into/to check (i.e. by comparison); to shave; (as 〜の〜に当たる) to be a relative of a person/to stand in a relationship
当て: (あて) - aim/object/purpose/end; expectations/prospects/hopes; something that can be relied upon; snack served with alcoholic drink; pad/guard; blow/strike; (宛, 宛て only) addressed to; (also written as 充て) per
当てがはずれる: (あてがはずれる) - to be contrary to one's expectations
当てが外れる: (あてがはずれる) - to be contrary to one's expectations
当てこする: (あてこする) - to insinuate; to satirize; to satirise; to take a dig at
当てこむ: (あてこむ) - to count on; to anticipate; to expect
当てずっぽう: (あてずっぽう) - conjecture; guesswork; at random
当てつけ: (あてつけ) - insinuation; innuendo; spiteful remark
当てにする: (あてにする) - to count on; to expect someone to (provide help, etc.)
当てにならない: (あてにならない) - not be relied upon; not to be counted on
当てはまる: (あてはまる) - to apply (a rule); to be applicable; to come under (a category); to fulfill
当てはめる: (あてはめる) - to apply; to adapt
当てられる: (あてられる) - to be affected by (e.g. heat)/to suffer from; to be embarrassed/to be annoyed
当てる: (あてる) - to hit; to expose; to apply (e.g. patch)/to put on/to put against/to hold on/to hold against; to allot/to call on someone (e.g. in class); to guess (an answer); to make a hit (e.g. in a lottery)
当て付け: (あてつけ) - insinuation; innuendo; spiteful remark
当て付けがましい: (あてつけがましい) - insinuating; snide
当て字: (あてじ) - kanji used as a phonetic symbol, instead of for the meaning/phonetic-equivalent character/substitute character; kanji used for their meaning, irrespective of reading
当て嵌まる: (あてはまる) - to apply (a rule); to be applicable; to come under (a category); to fulfill
当て嵌める: (あてはめる) - to apply; to adapt
当て技: (あてわざ) - blow to a vital point of a person's body
当て推量: (あてずいりょう) - conjecture; guesswork; at random
当て擦る: (あてこする) - to insinuate; to satirize; to satirise; to take a dig at
当て言: (あてこと) - snide remark/sarcasm; indirect expression/roundabout saying
当て身: (あてみ) - blow to a vital point of a person's body
当て込む: (あてこむ) - to count on; to anticipate; to expect
当て逃げ: (あてにげ) - hit-and-run accident causing property damage
当て馬: (あてうま) - stallion brought close to a mare to test her readiness to mate; stalking horse/spoiler
当に: (まさに) - (esp. 正に) exactly/surely/certainly; (esp. 将に) just (about to)/on the verge (of doing or happening); (esp. 当に) duly/naturally
当の昔: (とうのむかし) - a long time ago
当の本人: (とうのほんにん) - the person himself
当り: (あたり) - hit; success; guess/prediction; affability/friendliness; sensation/touch; bruise (on fruit); situation in which a stone or chain of stones may be captured on the next move (in the game of go); (also written as 魚信)  bite (of a fish on a hook)/strike; per/each
当りくじ: (あたりくじ) - winning ticket; lucky number
当りさわり: (あたりさわり) - (often as 当たり障りがない, 当たり障りのない, etc.) obstacle
当りめ: (アタリメ) - dried squid; dried cuttlefish
当りをつける: (あたりをつける) - to guess; to estimate
当りを付ける: (あたりをつける) - to guess; to estimate
当り屋: (あたりや) - lucky person/someone who made a lot of money (e.g. gambling or on the stock market); {baseb} skilled batter/batter on a hot streak; accident faker/someone who jumps in front of cars on purpose to extort money; barbershop
当り散らす: (あたりちらす) - to find fault with everybody; to make oneself disagreeable
当り籤: (あたりくじ) - winning ticket; lucky number
当り障り: (あたりさわり) - (often as 当たり障りがない, 当たり障りのない, etc.) obstacle
当り障りのない: (あたりさわりのない) - harmless and inoffensive
当り障りの無い: (あたりさわりのない) - harmless and inoffensive
当る: (あたる) - (ant: 外す・4) to be hit/to strike; to touch/to be in contact/to be affixed; to be equivalent to/to be applicable/to apply to; to be right on the money (of a prediction, criticism, etc.); to be selected (in a lottery, etc.)/to win; to be successful/to go well/to be a hit; to face/to confront; to lie (in the direction of); to undertake/to be assigned; to be stricken (by food poisoning, heat, etc.)/to be afflicted; to be called upon (by the teacher); to treat (esp. harshly)/to lash out at; (as 〜するには当たらない, etc.) to be unnecessary; {baseb} (usu. as 当たっている) to be hitting well/to be on a hitting streak; (in fishing) to feel a bite; (of fruit, etc.) to be bruised/to spoil; to feel (something) out/to probe into/to check (i.e. by comparison); to shave; (as 〜の〜に当たる) to be a relative of a person/to stand in a relationship
当を得る: (とうをえる) - to be in order; to be right
当世気質: (とうせいかたぎ) - (yoji) the way of the world in our time; the frame of mind of the people nowadays
当世風: (とうせいふう) - latest (fashion, hairstyle, etc.); up-to-date
当世風に言うと: (とうせいふうにいうと) - as we would say nowadays
当主: (とうしゅ) - (present) head of a family
当事者: (とうじしゃ) - person concerned; interested party; related party
当事者能力: (とうじしゃのうりょく) - admissibility of a party (to a suit)
当人: (とうにん) - the one concerned; the said person
当今: (とうこん) - nowadays; these days; at present
当付: (あてつけ) - insinuation; innuendo; spiteful remark
